title: The Devastating Inside Story on Comey  (Ep 1056)
description:
In this episode, I address the damning Comey report along with the reasons he was not legally prosecuted for his outrageous behavior. I also address some stunning reveals in the IG report about the operation to set up and entrap Donald Trump.

 News Picks:VP Pence drops the hammer and says the Bible stays.

 

Ilhan Omar is in trouble, again.

 

The Inspector General wrecks Jim Comey in this damning report.  

 

Joe Biden is making things up again. 

 

Ignorance of the history of socialism is a big problem for the younger generation.

 

The three Obama era documents could shed light on what really happened during the Obama years. 

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
